Address.value: 800 SOUTH STREET,SUITE 230, WALTHAM, Massachusetts, 02453, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Great Elm Capital Corp is an externally managed, non-diversified closed-end management investment company. The company seeks to generate current income and capital appreciation through debt and equity investments. It invests primarily in senior secured and senior unsecured debt instruments, as well as in junior loans and mezzanine debt of middle-market companies and small businesses. The company generates revenue primarily from interest on the debt investments that it holds.
